item.description:
Not into the bar scene? Looking for something else to do on a Friday night? Well that's OK, we'll still let you join us!

We're meeting at Empire Tea and Coffee on Broadway to play some board games. I'm hoping for a game of RISK, but other standbys include Settlers of Catan and Monopoloy (other games may make an appearance too).

It's all low-key and a great way to meet new people "on the island".

Have any questions? Send us a message. Have a game you think we'd like? Bring it along!

In your RSVP, please tell us whether you'd like to meet at Sapo Freaky Burrito beforehand (it's just a feet down the road). If there's interest, I'll add it to the agenda.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guys in the back. Also, try my cell: (401) 699-7304
item.name: Board Games @ Empire
